price: 51. Waxaan dhab ahaan horay u hallignay kuwii idin la midka ahaa ee ma jiraan mid uun ku waantoobi?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā ashyāʿakum fahal min muddakirin
